<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Lantern Archon](/Monsters.aspx?ID=30)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Friendly, curious, and eternally optimistic, lantern archons embody the virtue of hope. They are formed of living light given corporeal shape, and they serve as beacons, guiding mortals out of their darkest moments and toward the path of righteousness. Their luminous bodies can flicker with the subtlety of a candle flame or flare up like a torch. Lantern archons can control all aspects of their light as easily as other creatures control their facial expressions, leading them to change color, twinkle, and otherwise dim and brighten in time with their actions and words. While effervescent and chipper in conversation, lantern archons are impressively stoic mobile support troops and guardians in times of conflict, and are capable of uniting to form powerful warriors of light called gestalts.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Celestial](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 15

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 10
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Archon_LanternArchon.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 1">[Lantern Archon](/Monsters.aspx?ID=30)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="LG" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Archon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=13" />
<trait label="Celestial" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=23" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 26</row>

**Perception** +6; darkvision

**Languages**
[Celestial](/Languages.aspx?ID=16), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Infernal](/Languages.aspx?ID=19)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +8, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +6, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +6

<row gap="medium">
**Str** -5

**Dex** +3

**Con** +1

**Int** -1

**Wis** +1

**Cha** +1
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 16 

**Fort** +6 

**Ref** +10 

**Will** +4 

</row>

**HP** 20

**Resistances**
[fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72) 3

**Weaknesses**
evil 3

**Retributive Strike** <actions string="Reaction" /> A lantern archon can also make a Retributive Strike with its light ray.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** fly 40 feet

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
light ray +8 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Good](/Traits.aspx?ID=83), [Fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [range 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)),
**Damage** 1d4 fire plus 1d4 good

**Divine Innate Spells** DC 17
- **Cantrips (1st)**
[Light](/Spells.aspx?ID=171)
- **1st**
[Detect Alignment](/Spells.aspx?ID=65) (at will; evil only), [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)
- **4th**
[Read Omens](/Spells.aspx?ID=247)

**Gestalt** <actions string="Three Actions" /> ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157)) Nine lantern archons can use this activity, all within 1 round of the first, to merge together to form a composite being for 7 rounds that appears as a glowing warrior of light. The gestalt has the base statistics of a legion archon (AC, saving throws, attacks, skills, Speeds, and so on) but the spells and special abilities of a lantern archon. Additionally, it has a ranged light ray Strike (+18 attack, **Damage** 3d4 fire and 3d4 good), and the bonus from its Lantern of Hope increases to +3. When the gestalt separates, its remaining Hit Points are divided evenly among the lantern archons, and if the gestalt had fewer than 9 HP, some of the lantern archons die.

**Lantern of Hope** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) The lantern archon shines as a beacon of hope. Good allies within 30 feet gain a +1 status bonus to damage rolls and to saving throws against [_crushing despair_](/Spells.aspx?ID=57).

</column>
